T02D1301:199b-1: he badzra s'a dha no pi ka / bod skad du /
T02D1301:199b-2: kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1301:199b-3: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1301:199b-4: ye shes gnyis med rgyu dang bral //
T02D1301:199b-5: de bzhin tshogs bral gang gi gnas //
T02D1301:199b-7: de bsten cho ga bstan par bya //
T02D1301:199b-8: gsang ba'i don ldan sgrub pa pos //
T02D1301:199b-9: yang dag don ldan dam tshig dang //
T02D1301:199b-10: phyi nang gsang ba'i sdom pa shes //
T02D1301:200a-0: @200a * // slob dpon gsang dang shes rab dang //
T02D1301:200a-1: de bzhin bzhi pa'i dbang ldan pas //
T02D1301:200a-2: bsgom pa'i mchog ni bsgrub par 'gyur //
T02D1301:200a-3: shing gcig drung ngam dur khrod du //
T02D1301:200a-4: bsgom pa dag ni dge bar gsungs //
T02D1301:200a-5: yang na dben zhing dgon pa dang //
T02D1301:200a-6: ma mo'i gnas la sogs de bzhin //
T02D1301:200a-7: yang na bde zhing nyams dga' bar //
T02D1301:200a-8: rang gi 'dod pa bsgrub par bya //
T02D1301:200a-9: der ni bde zhing rgya che ba'i //
T02D1301:200a-10: stan la rnam par 'dug nas ni //
T02D1301:200a-11: me tog la sogs bye brag dang //
T02D1301:200a-12: bdud rtsi yis ni bsang gtor bya //
T02D1301:200a-13: rdo rjes mkha' snying dbus gnas par //
T02D1301:200a-14: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
T02D1301:200a-15: de la h'um yig 'bar ba yis //
T02D1301:200a-16: mtshon cha mchog ni spro bar bya //
T02D1301:200a-17: mkha' dbyings til gang bzhin rgyas pa'i //
T02D1301:200a-18: rang gi dkyil 'khor mchog bkug ste //
T02D1301:200a-19: rang snying sa bon mchog skyes pa'i //
T02D1301:200a-20: lha mo rnams kyis mchod par bya //
T02D1301:200a-21: goo r'i zla ba'i mtshan ma dang //
T02D1301:200a-22: tsoo r'i nyi ma'i snod 'dzin te //
T02D1301:200a-23: be t'a l'i yi lag na chu'o //
T02D1301:200a-26: sa ba r'i ni de bzhin bcud //
T02D1301:200a-28: dombi chags chen rjes chags pas //
T02D1301:200a-29: snying gar yongs su 'khyud pa ste //
T02D1301:200a-30: 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod //
T02D1301:200a-31: de rjes bsod nams yan lag go //
T02D1301:200a-32: gsum gyi skyabs 'gro sogs bya ste //
T02D1301:200a-34: sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang //
T02D1301:200a-35: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed dang //
T02D1301:200a-36: dam bca' bdag lus dbul bar bya //
T02D1301:200a-37: de nas dang por byams pa ste //
T02D1301:200a-38: de rjes snying rje rnam par bsgom //
T02D1301:200a-39: gsum par dga' ba bsgom par bya //
T02D1301:200a-40: kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms so //
T02D1301:200a-41: de nas ye shes blta ba'i phyir //
T02D1301:200a-42: phyi dang nang gi dngos 'di kun //
T02D1301:200a-43: rnam dag stong par rnam dpyad de //
T02D1301:200a-44: sprin med nam mkha' ltar bsams nas //
T02D1301:200a-45: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02D1301:200a-46: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1301:200a-47: sems brtan byed pa'i gsang sngags 'dis //
T02D1301:200a-48: stong pa nyid las sems kyi dngos //
T02D1301:200a-49: aa ham ao dang ldan pa ni //
T02D1301:200a-50: aom dbus ham gis 'brel pa las //
T02D1301:200a-51: ram la nyi ma bdun bsams te //
T02D1301:200a-52: de la h'um las byung ba yi //
T02D1301:200a-53: sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02D1301:200b-0: rdo rje des kyang ra @200b ba dang //
T02D1301:200b-1: dra ba 'ching ba'ang bsgom par bya //
T02D1301:200b-2: de dbus mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1301:200b-3: shes rab ae gzugs bsgom par bya //
T02D1301:200b-4: de steng sa dang chu dang ni //
T02D1301:200b-5: me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02D1301:200b-6: ljang gu dkar po dmar po dang //
T02D1301:200b-7: du ba'i mdog tu bsam par bya //
T02D1301:200b-8: gru bzhi zlum po gru gsum dang //
T02D1301:200b-9: zla kham dbyibs su rnam par bsam //
T02D1301:200b-10: de steng aom ldan aa ham ni //
T02D1301:200b-11: bdag nyid ngo bo gnas bsams te //
T02D1301:200b-12: ae gzugs nas ni aa ham bar //
T02D1301:200b-14: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1301:200b-15: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan //
T02D1301:200b-16: dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan //
T02D1301:200b-17: rdo rje thig gis yongs brgyan pa'o //
T02D1301:200b-18: de stengs chos dbyings bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1301:200b-19: ro ni mkhas pas rab bsgoms te //
T02D1301:200b-20: de la a'a li k'a li las //
T02D1301:200b-21: 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba bsam //
T02D1301:200b-22: de dag rab tu sa bon ni //
T02D1301:200b-23: aa dang h'um las gyur pa yi //
T02D1301:200b-24: rdo rje gri gug bsgom par bya //
T02D1301:200b-25: de la rang sems bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1301:200b-26: aa ham yongs su zhugs pa ni //
T02D1301:200b-27: dam pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1301:200b-29: de rnams gcig tu 'dres pa las //
T02D1301:200b-30: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1301:200b-31: he ru kar ni rnam par bsgom //
T02D1301:200b-32: zla ba me long ye shes te //
T02D1301:200b-33: de bzhin nyi ma mnyam pa nyid //
T02D1301:200b-34: sa bon las byung mtshan ma ni //
T02D1301:200b-35: so sor rtog par gsungs pa'o //
T02D1301:200b-36: dbyer med 'dres pa nan tan te //
T02D1301:200b-37: skur gyur chos dbyings ye shes yin //
T02D1301:200b-38: sku mdog sngo rengs shar ba'i 'od //
T02D1301:200b-40: dbu skra kham pa gyen du 'khyil //
T02D1301:200b-41: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1301:200b-42: 'khor lo snyan cha phyag gdub dang //
T02D1301:200b-43: mgur chu dang ni ske rags rnams //
T02D1301:200b-44: sangs rgyas lngar ni dag ba yis //
T02D1301:200b-45: 'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1301:200b-46: lo grangs bcu drug lta bu la //
T02D1301:200b-47: rab tu khros pa'i lta stangs can //
T02D1301:200b-48: g-yon na rdo rje thod pa dang //
T02D1301:200b-49: gnyis pa yum gyi bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1301:200b-51: g-yas na rdo rje nag po ste //
T02D1301:200b-52: h'um gi sgra 'byin bdag nyid can //
T02D1301:200b-53: zhe sdang bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
T02D1301:200b-54: gal te phyag rgya byed 'dod na //
T02D1301:200b-55: g-yon gyi dang po ka p'a la //
T02D1301:200b-56: lha dang lha min khrag gis bkang //
T02D1301:200b-57: g-yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste //
T02D1301:201a-0: @201a * // lhag pa'i phyag gnyis ji lta ba //
T02D1301:201a-2: gzhan yang sngon nyid ji lta ba'o //
T02D1301:201a-3: gzhan yang zhal gsum phyag drug ste //
T02D1301:201a-4: g-yas pa'i zhal ni skya rengs 'dra //
T02D1301:201a-5: g-yon pa dmar po gcer bu ste //
T02D1301:201a-6: g-yon gyi dang po tri sh'u la //
T02D1301:201a-7: g-yas kyi dang po rdo rje'o //
T02D1301:201a-8: g-yon pa gnyis pa dril bu dang //
T02D1301:201a-9: g-yas pa gnyis pa karta ri //
T02D1301:201a-10: lhag mas rdo rje lu gu rgyud //
T02D1301:201a-11: gri dang thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud //
T02D1301:201a-12: gzhan ni sngo bzhin yum de bzhin //
T02D1301:201a-13: gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba ni //
T02D1301:201a-14: zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa //
T02D1301:201a-15: bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1301:201a-16: bdud bzhi zhabs kyis rnam par mnan //
T02D1301:201a-18: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam brgyan cing //
T02D1301:201a-19: nyi ma la bzhugs gar gyis stabs //
T02D1301:201a-20: sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'chang //
T02D1301:201a-21: kha dog nag po 'jigs par byed //
T02D1301:201a-22: rang zhal nas ni h'um 'phro zhing //
T02D1301:201a-23: sku la thal bas rnam par byugs //
T02D1301:201a-24: bdag med ma dang mnyam ldan pa'i //
T02D1301:201a-25: dga' ba'i sbyor bas snyoms par 'jug / rnam par mi rtog bde ba yi //
T02D1301:201a-26: mi rtog rang bzhin bde bar gnas //
T02D1301:201a-27: dang po'i zhal ni nag po che //
T02D1301:201a-29: dpa' bo g-yon pa dmar ba che //
T02D1301:201a-30: steng gi zhal ni rnam par gtsigs //
T02D1301:201a-31: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i spyan dang ldan //
T02D1301:201a-32: lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba 'dra //
T02D1301:201a-33: g-yas kyi 'bar ba'i phyag brgyad na //
T02D1301:201a-35: glang po rta dang bong bu dang //
T02D1301:201a-36: ba lang rnga mo mi dag dang //
T02D1301:201a-37: byi la dang ni seng ge rnams //
T02D1301:201a-38: rim pa bzhin du shes par bya //
T02D1301:201a-39: sa dang chu dang rlung dang me //
T02D1301:201a-40: zla ba nyi ma de bzhin yang //
T02D1301:201a-41: gshin rje dang ni gnod sbyin rnams //
T02D1301:201a-43: sgeg dang dpa' dang mi sdug dang //
T02D1301:201a-44: rgod dang khro dang 'jigs par byed //
T02D1301:201a-45: snying rje ngo mtshar zhi la sogs //
T02D1301:201a-46: 'bar ba'i gar dgu nyams dang ldan //
T02D1301:201a-47: zhabs kyis sa la brdabs mdzad cing //
T02D1301:201a-48: lha min lha la bsdigs mdzad pa'i //
T02D1301:201a-49: rang gi snying gar ra yig las //
T02D1301:201a-50: byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom //
T02D1301:201a-51: de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi //
T02D1301:201a-52: ngo bo nyid kyi h'um yig go //
T02D1301:201a-53: rdo rje yi ge h'um las byung //
T02D1301:201a-54: kha dog nag po drag po che //
T02D1301:201a-55: rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par //
T02D1301:201b-0: @201b de nyid h'um du bsgom par bya //
T02D1301:201b-1: gzhan yang h'um yig yongs gyur pa'i //
T02D1301:201b-2: zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom //
T02D1301:201b-3: rdo rje las byung nag po che //
T02D1301:201b-5: yang na sngo rengs shar ba 'dra //
T02D1301:201b-6: dad pas nges par bsgom par bya //
T02D1301:201b-7: de nas gzhal yas yid 'ong pa'i //
T02D1301:201b-8: ma mo'i 'khor lo bsgom bya ste //
T02D1301:201b-9: yab yum gnyis su med pa yi //
T02D1301:201b-10: yid 'ong sbyor ba'i dgyes pa las //
T02D1301:201b-11: byung ba'i goo r'i dbang po'i phyogs //
T02D1301:201b-12: shar gyi sgor ni rnam par gnas //
T02D1301:201b-13: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1301:201b-14: byung ba'i tsoo r'i yang spros te //
T02D1301:201b-15: lho phyogs sgo skyong tsoo r'i gnas //
T02D1301:201b-17: be t'a l'i yang dbyung bar bya //
T02D1301:201b-18: spros nas bdud 'joms nub sgor ro //
T02D1301:201b-19: snyoms 'jug sbyor ba chen po las //
T02D1301:201b-20: ghasma r'i yang dbyung bar bya //
T02D1301:201b-21: spros nas byang gi sgo ru ni //
T02D1301:201b-22: khro mo'i gzugs su rnam par gnas //
T02D1301:201b-23: gnyis sprad pa yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1301:201b-24: pukka s'i yang dbyung bar bya //
T02D1301:201b-25: spros nas dbang ldan grva ru ni //
T02D1301:201b-26: 'khrug pa'i gzugs su rnam par gnas //
T02D1301:201b-27: gzhan yang gnyis med sbyor ba las //
T02D1301:201b-28: sha ba r'i ni me yi grva / tsandal'i ni srin po'i phyogs //
T02D1301:201b-30: goo r'i g-yas na gri gug ste //
T02D1301:201b-31: g-yon pa na ni de bzhin nya //
T02D1301:201b-32: tsoo r'i g-yas na rnge'u chung ste //
T02D1301:201b-33: g-yon pa'i phyag na phag pa'o //
T02D1301:201b-34: pe t'a l'i g-yas rus sbal te //
T02D1301:201b-36: ghasma r'i ni g-yas na sbrul //
T02D1301:201b-37: g-yon pa na ni rnal 'byor snod //
T02D1301:201b-38: pukka s'i g-yas seng ge ste //
T02D1301:201b-39: g-yon na de bzhin dgra sta'o //
T02D1301:201b-40: sa ba r'i g-yas dge slong ste //
T02D1301:201b-41: g-yon na de bzhin bsreg shang ngo //
T02D1301:201b-43: g-yon pa na ni de bzhin gshol //
T02D1301:201b-44: dombi g-yas na rdo rje ste //
T02D1301:201b-45: g-yon na de bzhin sdigs 'dzub po //
T02D1301:201b-46: goo r'i la sogs phyag gnyis gsungs //
T02D1301:201b-47: skyil krung phyed ma gar gyi stab sa //
T02D1301:201b-48: spyan gsum skra ni gyen du brdzes //
T02D1301:201b-49: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1301:201b-50: goo r'i sku mdog nag por 'gyur //
T02D1301:201b-51: tsoo r'i btsod dang 'dra ba ste //
T02D1301:201b-52: be t'a l'i ni gser btso ma //
T02D1301:201b-55: zla 'od lta bu'i sa pa r'i //
T02D1301:201b-56: tsandal'i ni nam mkha'i mdog /dombi sna tshogs dag tu bshad //
T02D1301:202a-2: drag po gshin rje gnod sbyin dang //
T02D1301:202a-3: bden bral na ni thags bzangs ris //
T02D1301:202a-4: goo r'i la sogs lha mo yi //
T02D1301:202a-5: rim bzhin gdan du shes par bya //
T02D1301:202a-6: de rnams sa bon 'di yin no //
T02D1301:202a-7: gam tsam bam gham pam sam lam dam //
T02D1301:202a-8: bdag pos sa bon 'di dag las //
T02D1301:202a-9: de rnams gdon pa nyid du bya //
T02D1301:202a-10: de nas rang gi rig ma dang //
T02D1301:202a-12: 'od du zhu bar gyur pa las //
T02D1301:202a-13: mtshams kyi lha mo bshes gnyen mos //
T02D1301:202a-14: sna tshogs glu yis mchod de bskul //
T02D1301:202a-15: kye yi rdo rje thugs rjes gzigs te pukka bdag la skyobs //
T02D1301:202a-16: bde ba chen po sbyar ba bdag 'dod stong pa'i rang bzhin bsal te bzhengs su gsol //
T02D1301:202a-17: stong pa'i rang bzhin bsal nas sa yi dngos grub dgos don du //
T02D1301:202a-18: gal te gson par mchis bzhed kye yi rdo rje bzhengs su gsol //
T02D1301:202a-19: tsanda bdag gis khyod med phyogs ma mthong nas gsol 'debs na //
T02D1301:202a-20: lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten bsgral bar dam bcas ci slad bzhugs //
T02D1301:202a-21: bdag ni do mbi'i mtshan ma med pa khyod kyi sems ni shes pa ste //
T02D1301:202a-22: thugs rje med pa de mi rung bas rdzu 'phrul lta bur bzhengs su gsol //
T02D1301:202a-23: de dag gsan nas sngon bzhin du //
T02D1301:202a-24: a'a: h'um dag las rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1301:202a-25: chen po 'od du zhu las bzhengs //
T02D1301:202a-26: de nas zhe sdang bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1301:202a-27: rang snying sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D1301:202a-28: 'bar ba nag po lcags kyu yis //
T02D1301:202a-29: khams gsum gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1301:202a-30: spyan drangs ma mo brgyad rnams kyis //
T02D1301:202a-31: sngon bzhin mchod de gsol ba gdab //
T02D1301:202a-32: bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1301:202a-33: bcom ldan rnams kyis dbang bskur ba //
T02D1301:202a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02D1301:202a-35: bdag la dbang bskur rab tu stsol //
T02D1301:202a-36: aom aa bhi shinytsa tu m'am sa rba badzra ta th'a ga ta aa dhishth'a na /
T02D1301:202a-37: de skad gsol ba btab pa yis //
T02D1301:202a-38: bde gshegs de dag thams cad kun //
T02D1301:202a-39: he ru ka yi skur gyur te //
T02D1301:202a-40: bde gshegs lnga yi bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1301:202a-41: bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur te //
T02D1301:202a-42: de tshe me tog gur gum char //
T02D1301:202a-43: 'bab dang rnga yi sgra grag cing //
T02D1301:202a-44: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma sogs dang //
T02D1301:202a-45: spyan sogs rdo rje dbyangs rnams kyis //
T02D1301:202a-46: dbang bskur rab tu byas pa yis //
T02D1301:202b-0: thugs kyi dbang phyug @202b sogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1301:202b-1: dbu rgyan du ni gyur par bya //
T02D1301:202b-2: mi bskyod rtag dang rin chen dbang //
T02D1301:202b-3: mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
T02D1301:202b-4: pukka s'i sogs mtshams gnas pa //
T02D1301:202b-5: rim pa bzhin du rgya yis gdab //
T02D1301:202b-6: zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang //
T02D1301:202b-7: 'dod chags rdo rje ma yis ni //
T02D1301:202b-8: sgo gnas kee ri la sogs pa //
T02D1301:202b-9: rim bzhin du ni gdab par bya //
T02D1301:202b-10: rgya yi gdab cing mtshan pas na //
T02D1301:202b-11: des 'dir rgyas zhes bya ba yin //
T02D1301:202b-12: rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02D1301:202b-13: sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhug byas te //
T02D1301:202b-14: bdud rtsi myang ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1301:202b-15: de dag tshim pa nyid du bya //
T02D1301:202b-16: rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1301:202b-17: zla gam gru gsum kha dog gnyis //
T02D1301:202b-18: yi ge yam dang ram gyis mtshan //
T02D1301:202b-19: ba dan dang ni rdo rjes mdzes //
T02D1301:202b-20: de steng bhandha aa las byung //
T02D1301:202b-21: der ni ye shes bdud rtsis bkang //
T02D1301:202b-22: yi ge h'um las rab bskyed pa'i //
T02D1301:202b-23: rdo rje las byung aom gyis mtshan //
T02D1301:202b-24: de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i //
T02D1301:202b-25: bdud rtsi lha yi sbyor bas bsang //
T02D1301:202b-26: mchod dang bstod pa nyid du bya //
T02D1301:202b-27: dag pa'i rang bzhin shes par bya //
T02D1301:202b-28: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
T02D1301:202b-29: 'du byed rnam shes phung por ni //
T02D1301:202b-30: rdo rje ma dang goo r'i dang //
T02D1301:202b-31: chu yi lha mo mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1301:202b-32: bdag med rnal 'byor mar dag go //
T02D1301:202b-33: sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi //
T02D1301:202b-34: pukka s'i la sogs pa'i dngos //
T02D1301:202b-35: gzugs sbra dri ro reg bya chos //
T02D1301:202b-36: goo r'i tsoo r'i be t'a l'i //
T02D1301:202b-37: ghasma sa spyod mkha' spyod do //
T02D1301:202b-38: mig dang rna ba sna dang lce //
T02D1301:202b-39: lus dang yid kyi dbang po ni //
T02D1301:202b-40: gti mug zhe sdang ser sna dang //
T02D1301:202b-41: 'dod chags phrag dog rdo rje dang //
T02D1301:202b-42: bdag med rnal 'byor mar shes bya //
T02D1301:202b-43: 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu dang //
T02D1301:202b-44: phyag gdub ska rags phyag rgya lnga //
T02D1301:202b-45: mi bskyong mtha' yas rin chen dbang //
T02D1301:202b-46: snang mdzad don grub bdag nyid do //
T02D1301:202b-47: phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab ste //
T02D1301:202b-48: phyag bzhi bdud bzhi rnam par dag / phyag drug pha rol phyin drug go //
T02D1301:202b-49: bcu drug phyag tu gsungs pa ni //
T02D1301:202b-50: stong pa bcu drug bdag nyid do //
T02D1301:202b-51: zhal gcig stong pa nyid kyi sgo //
T02D1301:202b-52: zhal gsum rnam par thar pa gsum //
T02D1301:202b-53: zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad //
T02D1301:202b-54: zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi dag pa nyid //
T02D1301:202b-55: spyan ni dag pa'i rdo rje gsum //
T02D1301:203a-2: skye mched drug dang 'byung ba rnams //
T02D1301:203a-3: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam dag pas //
T02D1301:203a-4: sna tshogs dag cing rnam par grol //
T02D1301:203a-5: gzugs yul la sogs gang gi yang //
T02D1301:203a-6: rnal 'byor pa yis mig yor tshul //
T02D1301:203a-7: thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag phyir //
T02D1301:203a-8: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs so //
T02D1301:203a-9: rnam par dag pa byas nas ni //
T02D1301:203a-10: rnal 'byor sdom pa'i bdag nyid dang //
T02D1301:203a-11: phyi nang bzlas pa brtsam par bya //
T02D1301:203a-12: de la 'di ni sdom pa ste //
T02D1301:203a-13: ae wam ma y'a'i bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1301:203a-14: 'khor lo bzhi ni lus la gnas //
T02D1301:203a-15: 'di ltar sprul pa'i chos dang ni //
T02D1301:203a-16: longs spyod bde chen 'khor lo rnams //
T02D1301:203a-17: lte ba snying ga mgul pa dang //
T02D1301:203a-18: spyi bor rim bzhin shes par bya //
T02D1301:203a-20: drug cu rtsa bzhi de bzhin brgyad //
T02D1301:203a-21: bcu drug sum cu gnyis su shes //
T02D1301:203a-22: sa bon aom dang h'um dang ni //
T02D1301:203a-23: aom dang ham ste rim bzhin no //
T02D1301:203a-24: a'a li k'a li sprul pa la //
T02D1301:203a-25: yongs su bskor bar shes par bya //
T02D1301:203a-26: bde gshegs yab yum sa bon gyis //
T02D1301:203a-27: chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin bskor //
T02D1301:203a-28: yi ge ai ae 'dren bcas pas //
T02D1301:203a-29: longs spyod 'khor lo bskor pa yin //
T02D1301:203a-30: sprul pa'i sku dang chos kyi sku //
T02D1301:203a-31: de bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1301:203a-32: sku gsum yongs su shes pa rnams //
T02D1301:203a-35: lha mo bzhi dang phyag rgya bzhi //
T02D1301:203a-37: sangs rgyas spyan dang m'a ma k'i //
T02D1301:203a-38: dkar mo sgrol ma de bzhin du //
T02D1301:203a-39: las dang chos dang dam tshig dang //
T02D1301:203a-40: phyag rgya chen por brjod pa'o //
T02D1301:203a-41: yi ge ae dang wam dag dang //
T02D1301:203a-42: ma dang y'a yang 'di yi dngos //
T02D1301:203a-43: de bzhin sku gsung thugs rnams dang //
T02D1301:203a-44: a'a li k'a li'ang 'di nyid yin //
T02D1301:203a-45: ye shes skad cig bzhir grags pa //
T02D1301:203a-46: sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang //
T02D1301:203a-47: rnam par 'joms dang mtshan nyid bral //
T02D1301:203a-48: 'khyud dang myong dang spyod pa dang //
T02D1301:203a-49: ci yab ma yin pa yi sems //
T02D1301:203a-50: 'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa yin //
T02D1301:203a-52: phung po nyon mongs bzhi 'byin pa //
T02D1301:203a-53: bden pa bzhi yang 'di nyid do //
T02D1301:203a-54: bdag dang sngags dang lha dang ni //
T02D1301:203a-55: ye shes rnams kyi de nyid rnams //
T02D1301:203a-56: rang rang yang dag gang yin pa'am //
T02D1301:203b-1: dga' dang dam pa'i dga' ba dang //
T02D1301:203b-2: bral dang rang bzhin dga' ba rnams //
T02D1301:203b-3: bde ba'i ye shes cha bzhi ste //
T02D1301:203b-4: drod thob pa dang 'phel ba dang //
T02D1301:203b-5: chags bral bde dang mi gnyis bde //
T02D1301:203b-6: de yang 'khor lo bzhi la gnas //
T02D1301:203b-7: gnas brtan thams cad yod par smra //
T02D1301:203b-8: de bzhin mang pos bkur ba dang //
T02D1301:203b-9: dge 'dun phal chen sde zhes pa //
T02D1301:203b-10: sde pa bzhi yang de nyid yin //
T02D1301:203b-11: rnal 'byor gsang sngags sdom pa dang //
T02D1301:203b-12: ye shes sdom pa'ang bstan par bya //
T02D1301:203b-13: sme sha lte bar 'bar ba yis //
T02D1301:203b-14: de bzhin gshegs lnga bsregs pa dang //
T02D1301:203b-15: spyan la sogs pa bsregs pa dang //
T02D1301:203b-17: de ni 'di ltar shes bya ste //
T02D1301:203b-18: rnal 'byor gsang sngags sdom pa yis //
T02D1301:203b-19: bsreg pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya //
T02D1301:203b-20: bsreg pa me dang rlung yin te //
T02D1301:203b-21: ye shes me yi snang ba gang //
T02D1301:203b-22: las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yin //
T02D1301:203b-23: las kyang bcom ldan shes rab ma'i //
T02D1301:203b-24: rlung gi de nyid 'di yin te //
T02D1301:203b-25: lte ba'i dbus las 'phro zhing phra //
T02D1301:203b-26: chos dang longs spyod bde chen bzhi //
T02D1301:203b-27: brtan dang g-yo ba kun gyi bdag / yi ge aam gi bdag nyid ni //
T02D1301:203b-28: las kyi rlung gi gzhi yin te //
T02D1301:203b-30: 'di dag rgyu ba'i rim pa ni //
T02D1301:203b-31: nyi ma gcig la thun bzhi ste //
T02D1301:203b-32: de bzhin chu tshod sum cu gnyis //
T02D1301:203b-33: rim pa bcu drug de bzhin du //
T02D1301:203b-34: drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha dang ldan //
T02D1301:203b-35: zla ba nyi ma zhes bya ba'i //
T02D1301:203b-36: a'a li k'a li'i ngo bo ni //
T02D1301:203b-37: sna bug g-yas dang g-yon du rgyu //
T02D1301:203b-38: de yang sa dang chu dang ni //
T02D1301:203b-39: me dang rlung gi bdag nyid can //
T02D1301:203b-41: 'di rnams dus su rgyu ba ste //
T02D1301:203b-42: nam mkha'i rang bzhin du sa ma yin //
T02D1301:203b-43: lci zhing mkhrang ba sa yi khams //
T02D1301:203b-44: thur du rgyu ba dang por 'dod //
T02D1301:203b-45: grang zhing rtsub pa chu yi khams //
T02D1301:203b-46: mdun du rgyu ba gnyis pa yin //
T02D1301:203b-47: dro zhing 'jam pa me yi khams //
T02D1301:203b-48: 'di ni phyir la nye bar rgyu //
T02D1301:203b-49: yang zhing stobs can rlung gi khams //
T02D1301:203b-50: gyen du rgyu bar shes par bya //
T02D1301:203b-51: de bzhin chu tshod rim pa dang //
T02D1301:203b-52: thun zhes bya bar grags pa yang //
T02D1301:203b-54: g-yas su ji bzhin g-yon de bzhin //
T02D1301:203b-55: de nas kyang ni g-yas yin te //
T02D1301:203b-56: bar chad yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1301:203b-57: dus min rgyu ba gang zhe na //
T02D1301:204a-0: @204a * // gang zhig 'chi ba'i dus nyid dang //
T02D1301:204a-1: byang chub sems rgyun 'bab pa dang //
T02D1301:204a-2: nad chen 'byung ba'i snga ltas la //
T02D1301:204a-3: de dag dus gcig 'byung ba ste //
T02D1301:204a-4: 'di ni nam mkha'i khams su brjod //
T02D1301:204a-5: rlung dang ye shes rnam shes dang //
T02D1301:204a-6: dug rnams lhan cig rgyu ba ste //
T02D1301:204a-7: nams kyang 'bral ba ma yin no //
T02D1301:204a-8: reg pa'i rlung zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1301:204a-9: lus las nam yang mi 'da' ste //
T02D1301:204a-11: rlung gi de nyid shes pa yis //
T02D1301:204a-12: me yi de nyid bskul bar bya //
T02D1301:204a-13: dbugs dang drod kyi khams dag kyang //
T02D1301:204a-14: tha dad 'jug pa ma yin no //
T02D1301:204a-15: de la me yi de nyid ni //
T02D1301:204a-16: dbang po gtsubs pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1301:204a-18: ji ltar phyi rol me bzhin no //
T02D1301:204a-19: de yang dbang po'i lam nas ni //
T02D1301:204a-20: lte ba'i rtsa ru rab tu 'bar //
T02D1301:204a-21: 'od chen du bar bcas pa yis //
T02D1301:204a-23: ye shes me yi snang ba de //
T02D1301:204a-24: shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa dang //
T02D1301:204a-25: chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i //
T02D1301:204a-26: bde gshegs lnga dang de bzhin du //
T02D1301:204a-27: lha mor bcas pa tshig par 'gyur //
T02D1301:204a-28: longs spyod 'khor lo byung nas ni //
T02D1301:204a-29: g-yas nas bskor ba lan gsum byas //
T02D1301:204a-30: smin phrag mdzod spur byung nas kyang //
T02D1301:204a-31: de nas rna ba g-yas su byung //
T02D1301:204a-32: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bskul byas nas //
T02D1301:204a-33: spyi bo'i gtsug tu zhugs par gyur //
T02D1301:204a-34: chos kyi 'khor lo la babs te //
T02D1301:204a-35: shin tu tshig par gyur pa 'di //
T02D1301:204a-36: sngags kyi sngom par 'dod pa yin //
T02D1301:204a-37: ye shes sngom pa'i bye brag ni //
T02D1301:204a-38: snying gar sangs rgyas bka' ba gros nas //
T02D1301:204a-39: rnam dag bdud rtsi bsdus byas te //
T02D1301:204a-40: sngon gyi lam nas byung nas kyang //
T02D1301:204a-41: phyogs bcu bdud rtsi bsdu byas te //
T02D1301:204a-42: sngon bzhin ham la zhugs gyur pas //
T02D1301:204a-43: sems kyi zla ba zhu nas ni //
T02D1301:204a-44: so yi sbu gu nas byung nas //
T02D1301:204a-45: longs spyod 'khor lor babs par gyur //
T02D1301:204a-46: der ni cung zad ngal so nas //
T02D1301:204a-47: sngon bzhin phyir yang bskor nas ni //
T02D1301:204a-48: chos kyi 'khor lor babs par gyur //
T02D1301:204a-49: bde bar gshegs rnams gang bar byas //
T02D1301:204a-50: sngon bzhin phyir yang bskor nas ni //
T02D1301:204a-51: sprul pa'i 'khor lor babs par gyur //
T02D1301:204a-52: de bzhin kun du 'gro bar byed //
T02D1301:204a-53: skra yi rtse mo 'bum gyi cha //
T02D1301:204a-54: ye shes snang ba'i bye brag dang //
T02D1301:204a-55: mig gis mthong ba ma yin no //
T02D1301:204b-1: nang gi bzlas pa bstan pa ni //
T02D1301:204b-3: gru gsum gnas ni de bzhin me //
T02D1301:204b-4: lto ba chu yi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D1301:204b-5: de steng dbang chen ri rab bcas //
T02D1301:204b-6: rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
T02D1301:204b-7: rtag pa'i 'khor lo bsgom bya ste //
T02D1301:204b-8: de la mi gnyis bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1301:204b-9: yi ge aa yi sdom pa gzung //
T02D1301:204b-10: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di //
T02D1301:204b-11: lus dang ngag yid gang yang min //
T02D1301:204b-12: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug min //
T02D1301:204b-13: kha dog dbyibs sogs ma yin zhing //
T02D1301:204b-14: khro zhi la sogs rnam par spangs //
T02D1301:204b-15: mtshan ma kun dang bral ba yi //
T02D1301:204b-16: dbu ma chen po bsgom par bya //
T02D1301:204b-17: gzhan ni sdom pa ji lta ba'o //
T02D1301:204b-18: 'di ni ci yang ma yin phyir //
T02D1301:204b-19: ma ning bzlas pa zhes 'dod de //
T02D1301:204b-20: bzlas pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin //
T02D1301:204b-21: gal te skyo bar gyur na ni //
T02D1301:204b-22: phyi rol bzlas pa brtsam par bya //
T02D1301:204b-23: rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02D1301:204b-24: ye shes sems dpa'i gnas nyid dang //
T02D1301:204b-25: sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams nas //
T02D1301:204b-26: ji ltar 'dod pa spro bar bya //
T02D1301:204b-27: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1301:204b-29: aom tree loky'a kshe pa h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1301:204b-31: aom dzva la dzva la bhyo h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1301:204b-33: aom ki ti ki ti badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1301:204b-36: phim gordha ke sha brta ma ne /
T02D1301:204b-37: tsa tu rbim sha ti ni tr'a ya sho da
T02D1301:204b-38: sha bhu dz'a ya krishna dz'i m'u ta wa pu
T02D1301:204b-39: she ka p'a l'a m'a la aa ne kam dha
T02D1301:204b-40: ri ne a'a dham ta kr'u ra tsitta' ya //
T02D1301:204b-41: aardhen du dam sht'i ne m'a ra ya m'a ra ya //
T02D1301:204b-42: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
T02D1301:204b-45: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02D1301:204b-46: sa pha s'a ga r'a na /
T02D1301:204b-50: sha tr'um ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha: phat sv'a h'a //
T02D1301:204b-52: bzlas pas skyo bar gyur pa na //
T02D1301:204b-53: rdo rje dril bug sil byas te //
T02D1301:204b-54: mchod dang bstod dang smon lam dag //
T02D1301:204b-55: legs par btab ste phyag rgya dgrol //
T02D1301:204b-56: dbyings su bsdu dang gshegs gsol ba //
T02D1301:204b-57: ji lta ji bzhin bya ba yin //
T02D1301:204b-58: de nas rnal 'byor chen po yis //
T02D1301:204b-59: spyod lam kun du lha nyid kyi //
T02D1301:204b-60: ting nge 'dzin las nyams mi bya //
T02D1301:204b-61: 'di ltar nyal ba'i tshe na yang //
T02D1301:204b-63: chags chen rjes su chags byas te //
T02D1301:204b-64: ye shes me yis lus zhu nas //
T02D1301:205a-2: gang tshe ldang ba'i tshe na yang //
T02D1301:205a-3: tshad med bzhi yis bskul ba yis //
T02D1301:205a-4: sngon gyi smon lam rjes dran nas //
T02D1301:205a-5: sgyu ma lta bu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1301:205a-6: ting 'dzin rim par ldang bar bya //
T02D1301:205a-7: gang zhig za ba'i tshe na yang //
T02D1301:205a-8: sdom pa'i dngos po ji lta ba'i //
T02D1301:205a-9: lus ni lha yi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D1301:205a-10: zas ni bdud rtsir byin brlab bya //
T02D1301:205a-11: zos pas dbyer med tshim par bya //
T02D1301:205a-12: yang na sbyin sreg mchod pa bya //
T02D1301:205a-13: ra sa ya na me yi khams //
T02D1301:205a-15: a'a li'i ngo bor shes par bya //
T02D1301:205a-16: la la n'a ni rlung gi khams //
T02D1301:205a-17: g-yon du gtsubs shing g-yo ba ste //
T02D1301:205a-18: k'a li'i ngo bor shes par bya //
T02D1301:205a-19: de dbus lus kyi bdag nyid la //
T02D1301:205a-20: bza' sogs 'o ma'i sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1301:205a-22: rigs lnga rnams la bslang ba dang //
T02D1301:205a-23: phyag rgya la sogs rgyan rnams dang //
T02D1301:205a-24: rdo rje thos pa'i spyod pa dag / ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin bya //
T02D1301:205a-25: 'dis ni byang chub rnyed mi dka' //
T02D1301:205a-26: gal te gtor ma gtong 'dod na //
T02D1301:205a-27: he ru ka yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1301:205a-28: 'byung po la ni mngon dmigs te //
T02D1301:205a-29: zas rnams bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas //
T02D1301:205a-30: sngags 'di yis ni tshim par bya //
T02D1301:205a-59: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am /
T02D1301:205a-60: a'a n+ya nu tpanna tv'a ta /
T02D1301:205a-61: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1301:205a-62: gang zhig rtag tu 'du byed pa //
T02D1301:205a-63: las rnams thams cad 'grub pa dang //
T02D1301:205a-64: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dga' nas ni //
T02D1301:205a-65: de la dngos grub myur bar 'gyur //
T02D1301:205a-66: las rnams dag gi mjug tu yang //
T02D1301:205a-67: mchod dang bstod cing smon lam gdab //
T02D1301:205a-68: de la smon lam 'di yin te //
T02D1301:205a-69: rigs ldan skye zhing blo gros rjes su ldan //
T02D1301:205a-70: dam tshig ldan zhing kye yi rdo rje ston //
T02D1301:205a-71: snying rje ldan zhing bla ma rnams la gus //
T02D1301:205a-72: skye ba kun du 'di ltar skye gyur cig / rdo rje dril bu lag gis 'khrol byed cing //
T02D1301:205a-73: zab mo'i dam chos rab tu klog pa dang //
T02D1301:205a-74: dam tshig btsun mo'i khu ba za byed par //
T02D1301:205a-75: skye ba kun du 'di ltar skye gyur cig / de nas sppul pa rang la bsdu //
T02D1301:205b-0: ye shes dkyil 'khor @205b slar gshegs gsol //
T02D1301:205b-1: spyod lam la sogs sngon bzhin du'o //
T02D1301:205b-2: slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa /
T02D1301:205b-3: he badzra'i sgrub thabs he ru ka mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//
T02D1301:205b-4: rgya gar gyi mkhan po manydzu shr'i dzny'a na dang /
